data.text: @Fiona_M_Russell @CollignonPeter @paimadhu But they arenâ€™t being directed to the vulnerable are they? They are being forced on the working class, the teenagers and 20 year olds playing sport and Woolworths workers, which makes everyone angry and promotes distrust of motives

@aellis_writer @Fiona_M_Russell @paimadhu My view. Among the elderly, the virus is definitely worse.

Time will tell on everyone else.
@Fiona_M_Russell @paimadhu Have you seen the trial data released by Pfizer that has 9 pages of adverse reactions. Due diligence
@paimadhu The situation in Hong Kong is also very serious

@Jasonphilip8 @paimadhu Seems Omicron gets to make the rules as it goes along, and it doesn't play fair or honor good intentions. Just have to get vaccinated, be smart to your situation, and watch the game play out to its individual ends.
@Fiona_M_Russell What age do you think boosters make a difference from?
@paimadhu Goes to show how transmissible Omicron is & how important it is to get vaccines & boosters into high risk & elderly fast
@paimadhu But what explains it? They played by the rules!
@paimadhu How do we explain this and the Hong Kong surge?
